abstract: Gary D. Cohn, the president and chief operating officer of Goldman Sachs, said Wall Street still faced a challenge in explaining its role in the lives of everyday people.
snippet: Gary D. Cohn, the president and chief operating officer of Goldman Sachs, said Wall Street still faced a challenge in explaining its role in the lives of everyday people.
lead_paragraph: Gary D. Cohn, the president and chief operating officer of Goldman Sachs, was sitting on stage at a conference in Manhattan on Thursday when the speaker introducing him cracked a joke.
